ranges.label: Normal
ranges.description: Your mood appears stable. Keep practicing positive habits.

ranges.label: Mild Depression
ranges.description: You might be experiencing low mood. Monitor your feelings and consider self-care strategies.

ranges.label: Moderate Depression
ranges.description: You may benefit from talking to a counselor or a trusted person.

ranges.label: Severe Depression
ranges.description: Professional mental health support is strongly recommended.

ranges.label: Extremely Severe Depression
ranges.description: It is crucial to seek immediate help from a mental health professional.

ranges.label: Normal
ranges.description: You're showing no signs of clinical anxiety. Keep managing stress effectively.

ranges.label: Mild Anxiety
ranges.description: You might experience occasional anxious thoughts. Relaxation techniques may help.

ranges.label: Moderate Anxiety
ranges.description: Consider stress management or talking to a support system.

ranges.label: Severe Anxiety
ranges.description: It may be beneficial to consult a therapist or counselor.

ranges.label: Extremely Severe Anxiety
ranges.description: Please consider seeking professional help to manage your anxiety.

ranges.label: Normal
ranges.description: You’re experiencing low levels of stress. Keep up the healthy habits!

ranges.label: Mild Stress
ranges.description: Try incorporating mindfulness or physical activity into your routine.

ranges.label: Moderate Stress
ranges.description: Talking to a friend or using relaxation strategies can help.

ranges.label: Severe Stress
ranges.description: It's important to take steps to reduce stress. Professional advice can be helpful.

ranges.label: Extremely Severe Stress
ranges.description: Immediate stress management support is highly recommended.

ranges.label: Feeling Low
ranges.description: It’s okay to have tough days. Try focusing on small moments of joy or talking to someone you trust.

ranges.label: Doing Okay
ranges.description: You're holding up. Consider doing things that make you smile — a walk, a chat, or your favorite hobby.

ranges.label: Generally Happy
ranges.description: You seem to be in a positive space! Keep embracing the things and people that lift your spirits.

ranges.label: Feeling Great
ranges.description: That’s wonderful to see! You're radiating good vibes — spread the positivity and keep doing what works for you!

ranges.label: Low Social Support
ranges.description: It seems like you may be feeling isolated. It might help to reach out to family, friends, or a professional to build a stronger support network.

ranges.label: Below Average Support
ranges.description: You may have some support, but there could be room for improvement. Consider connecting with others more often.

ranges.label: Average Social Support
ranges.description: You seem to have a decent support system. Remember, it's always helpful to keep those connections strong and reach out when needed.

ranges.label: Strong Social Support
ranges.description: You have a solid support network, which can help you navigate tough situations. It's great to maintain these healthy connections.

ranges.label: Low Resilience
ranges.description: You may struggle to cope with setbacks. It might help to practice stress management techniques.

ranges.label: Below Average Resilience
ranges.description: You may bounce back from some challenges but might benefit from building more coping strategies.

ranges.label: Average Resilience
ranges.description: You handle stress reasonably well but may still face difficulties in challenging times.

ranges.label: High Resilience
ranges.description: You have strong resilience and bounce back effectively from challenges.

ranges.label: Unhealthy Relationship
ranges.description: The relationship may be struggling. It might be helpful to address the issues and consider open communication.

ranges.label: Below Average Relationship
ranges.description: There are challenges in the relationship. Working on trust and communication can help improve the situation.

ranges.label: Relatively Healthy Relationship
ranges.description: The relationship is relatively healthy. Continue to nurture trust, respect, and open communication.

ranges.label: Harmonious Relationship
ranges.description: The relationship is strong and harmonious. Maintain the positive aspects that make the relationship work well.

ranges.label: Low Self-Esteem
ranges.description: You may have a negative self-view or feel dissatisfied with yourself. Consider practicing self-compassion and seeking support to boost your self-worth.

ranges.label: Below Average Self-Esteem
ranges.description: You may doubt your abilities at times, but with effort and self-care, you can strengthen your confidence.

ranges.label: Average Self-Esteem
ranges.description: You have a fairly balanced view of yourself, but you might still have some areas to work on. Keep building your confidence!

ranges.label: Healthy Self-Esteem
ranges.description: You generally feel good about yourself. Keep nurturing your self-worth and focusing on your strengths.

ranges.label: High Self-Esteem
ranges.description: You have a strong sense of self-worth and confidence. Continue embracing your strengths and maintaining a positive outlook on yourself.

ranges.label: Low Loneliness
ranges.description: You seem to have a good level of social connection. Keep nurturing your relationships.

ranges.label: Moderate Loneliness
ranges.description: You may feel lonely at times. Consider reaching out to others to strengthen your connections.

ranges.label: High Loneliness
ranges.description: You seem to experience significant loneliness. It could be helpful to seek support or engage in social activities.

ranges.label: Very High Loneliness
ranges.description: It seems like you're feeling isolated and disconnected. Reaching out for support could be beneficial.
